Text.Page:
There's a lot of storage down hereâ€”too much for me to search while I'm sneaking around.

But there's another way. If the Red Lash pirates have something unusual down here, the {@LinkCreature:11#1003#Red Lash veterans} will have it in the manifests they carry around with them.

Let me look through these...Yep, bombs all right. And lots of them!

They're moving them from storage to the dock area. And there's a "magic stone" that's part of the same shipment.

You better let Otus know something big is in the works.
Get the manifests from the {@LinkCreature:11#1003#Red Lash veterans}, and we'll get to the bottom of this.
